name: Zubaida Tariq
awards: Masala TV Award for Best Cooking Expert

description: Zubaida Tariq was a well-known Pakistani chef who was famous for her traditional cooking techniques and delicious recipes. She was a household name in Pakistan and had a huge fan following. Her cooking shows were very popular and she was known for her friendly and easy-to-follow style of teaching. She passed away in January 2018, but her legacy as a great Pakistani chef lives on.
